name: Battle Orb
summary:
Battle Orb – Mixed Reality Strategy PvP

Join or Discord server: https://discord.gg/zK88kVsv

Get ready to aim, launch, and dominate in Battle Orb, the ultimate real-time strategy game in mixed reality! 🎯 Step into your space, battle opponents worldwide, and master a whole new kind of physics-based combat.

💥 Battle Orb fuses fast-paced PvP, smart tactics, and immersive MR gameplay that turns any room into an arena.

👾 FEATURES YOU’LL LOVE:

    ⚔️ Real-Time PvP Battles – Face off in 2-player or...
